explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a model (STCNN-RN) based on machine learning techniques to detect anomalies in stock data.
explanations.deep learning: The model uses a spatiotemporal convolutional neural network, which is a deep learning approach.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model is a type of neural network (spatiotemporal convolutional neural network).
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model specifically uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) architecture.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is the core architecture of the proposed model.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns complex correlations between financial time-series data, which involves representation learning.
explanations.feature learning: The model learns features from financial time-series data to detect anomalies.
explanations.feature representation: The model's ability to learn correlations implies it is learning feature representations of the data.
